title: Syntax and Domain Aware Model for Unsupervised Program Translation. (arXiv:2302.03908v2 [cs.SE] UPDATED)
abstract: There is growing interest in software migration as the development of software and society. Manually migrating projects between languages is error-prone and expensive. In recent years, researchers have begun to explore automatic program translation using supervised deep learning techniques by learning from large-scale parallel code corpus. However, parallel resources are scarce in the programming language domain, and it is costly to collect bilingual data manually. To address this issue, several unsupervised programming translation systems are proposed. However, these systems still rely on huge monolingual source code to train, which is very expensive. Besides, these models cannot perform well for translating the languages that are not seen during the pre-training procedure. In this paper, we propose SDA-Trans, a syntax and domain-aware model for program translation, which leverages the syntax structure and domain knowledge to enhance the cross-lingual transfer ability. SDA-Trans adopt

ret.translated_title: 无监督程序翻译的语法和领域感知模型
ret.translated_abstract: 随着软件开发和社会的发展，软件迁移越来越受到关注。手动在不同语言之间迁移项目很容易出现错误且代价高昂。近年来，研究人员开始利用大规模平行代码语料库进行监督深度学习技术来探索自动程序翻译。然而，在编程语言领域中，平行资源很少，手动收集双语数据代价高昂。为了解决这个问题，提出了几个无监督的程序翻译系统。然而，这些系统仍然依赖于大量单语源代码进行训练，成本很高。此外，这些模型在翻译预训练过程中没有见过的语言上表现不佳。本文提出了SDA-Trans，一种用于程序翻译的语法和领域感知模型，它利用语法结构和领域知识增强跨语言转移能力。
ret.tldr: 本文提出了一种无监督程序翻译的语法和领域感知模型SDA-Trans，可以利用语法结构和领域知识来增强跨语言转移能力。
